duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage complex projects in a variety of market sectors including Commercial Mixed use, Academic, Civic and Cultural, Hospitality, and Science and Technology.
Coordinate with client representatives, project managers, designers, consultants, architects, engineers, general contractors, vendors, and specialty contractors for successful project delivery.
Monitor project performance and responsible for team progress through developing and achieving the project plan.
Responsible for the financial, technical, and project success and for client satisfaction.
Forecast and organize project design development and production delivery.
Conduct programming, planning, design, specification, coordination, punch, and post occupancy.
Assist the client in understanding budgets and schedule.
Attend OAC and coordination meetings and offer onsite assistance in construction observation and field verification.
Prepare and deliver client presentations and maintain knowledge of best practices in project management.
Participate in interviews for project work, network to build relationships with new and return clients.

education_certification.credential: Degree in architecture with 10+ years of relevant professional experience in Academic, Corporate & Commercial, Science & Technology sectors
